pages.text: $(li)The Alligator Snapping Turtle is a semi-aquatic creature that can be found in the depths of the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/swamp/swamp)Swamp$(/l) of the Overworld.$(br)$(li)This creature will attack anything that steps near it.$(br)$(li)Sometimes they drop a piece of $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/alexsmobs/spiked_scute)Spiked Scute$(/l).
